title: Yakitate!! Japan
resume: Azuma Kazuma isn't terribly clever, but he's got a good heart and  great skill - at baking. Since childhood, he's been on a quest to create  the perfect bread to represent Japan internationally. Now, he seeks to  enter the famous bakery Pantasia, in hopes of reaching his goal. But  plots abound...
